messages.content:
You are assisting with retrieval-augmented generation for the rag-workshop demo.
Use the Weather MCP server to gather current conditions that match the user question. Summarise the weather data in 2-3 sentences and explain how it is relevant to the query before handing back to the main agent.

jira-issue-context.description: Fetch JIRA issue context (search + issue details) before answering project queries.

messages.content: You are preparing a response involving project delivery updates. Use the JIRA MCP server to execute JQL searches or fetch specific issue details mentioned in the user's request. Summarise the issue status, assignee, and latest update, then return the consolidated context to the main agent.
